about_me.description: My name is Svitlana and I'm a photographer based in Vinnytsia, Ukraine. I'm passionate about photography, music, and programming. In my work, I usually use the Nikon DSLR camera, which helps me to shoot high-quality photos. Also, I'm pretty good at post-processing techniques, so you can be sure I'll bring even more life, colors, and style in your photo album! I will be happy to help you capture the wonderful moments of your life.
about_me.description_end: Feel free to contact me and thank you for taking time to look at my site and works. I hope to meet you in the near future.
about_me.testimonials_1_title: I was happy to work with Svitlana!
about_me.testimonials_1_description_part1: Svitlana, I'm extremely gladful for your excellent work and big efforts. You're always a nice and positive person.
about_me.testimonials_1_description_part2: I used to be shy and usually, I feel a bit uncomfortable on the photosession. But with you, it was a completely different thing. I was able to relax and have fun.
about_me.testimonials_1_description_part3: As a result, we created a set of really incredible photos! I want to look at them again and again :) Some of them revealed to me differently over time and I like them even more now. On the photos, I'm always real and that's what I really appreciate.
about_me.testimonials_1_footer: I look forward to working with you again!
